name: RE:CALL
storyline:
In RE:CALL your actions inside flashbacks have immediate consequences in the present moment. Tackle mind-bending puzzles that rely on altering your own memories to shape the future. 
 
Change your memories, change the present.
summary: In RE:CALL memories are malleable and changing them will modify the present. Tackle mind-bending puzzles that rely on altering your own recollections to shape the future.
